Class ServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • affix.java.effective.moneyservice.ServiceConfig
  • public class ServiceConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for IO, reading configuration files and exchange rate files
    Author:
    Group Center

      (package private) static double BUY_RATE
      BUY_RATE - double defining the profit margin which exchange rate for buying should be adjusted with.
